product_name: SP Gadgets POV Tripod Grip Pole
long_description: This small, lightweight action-cam handle doubles as a tripod, making it the perfect travel companion for your camera. Plus, the GoPro ball mount allows the perfect angle for more creative shots.
short_description: This small, lightweight action-cam handle doubles as a tripod, making it the perfect travel companion for your camera. Plus, the GoPro ball mount allows the perfect angle for more creative shots.
